title: Universal Monsters: Dracula
description: THE DEPARTMENT OF TRUTH creators James Tynion IV (W0RLDTR33, Something is Killing the Children) and Martin Simmonds re-team to tell a new tale of the monster who started it all!?  When Dr. John Seward admits a strange new patient named Renfield into his asylum, the madman tells stories of a demon who has taken residence next door. But as Dr. Seward attempts to apply logic to the impossible…his daughter falls under the spell of the twisted Count Dracula! ?  Featuring a Direct Market Exclusive cover by Stephanie Pepper that will only be printed once.  Collects UNIVERSAL DRACULA #1-4
author: James Tynion IV
